body:
hi, everyone



I'm studying annual daylight simulation using LB+HB.

I try to use bsdf material in this sim.

I have a error.



if i change other material, this sim can run.



someone please tell me advice.

replies.body:
I can run gridbase daylight sim(instantaneous value)

but when we try to run annnual simulation using same material, this error occured.

sorry, my update file is hard to see.

I make simlpe data.

plese check this file and bsdf data.
Daysim can't handle BSDF material. Check this discussion for possible solutions: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/563](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/563)

hi,mastapha



thank you for your advice.

I understand about this error.



I try to another method.
